text:
I recall we had some issues with oceananigans colliding with Flux, and I came across this in julia docs - they provide a solution:
<https://docs.julialang.org/en/v1/manual/style-guide/#Avoid-type-piracy>
Sorry if I forget what the issue was exactly, but I recall showing it to <@UEP056STX>
